content: a simple triangle kerchief knit in our berkley base a 100% cashmere yarn that is delightful to wear yarn 1 skein yarn twisters berkley 210 yards/50g 100% cashmere or any fingering weight yarn sample knit in colourway cherry gauge 20 sts by 24 row equals 4 by 4 in 6 row pattern repeat before blocking needles 3 5 mm us 4 needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions removable stitch marker optional to mark the right side of the work darning needle finished size centre depth 13 33cm wingspan 41 104cm
